(static) append_semi_stiff_cam(obj, target, offset, rotation_offsetopt, clamp_left, clamp_right, clamp_up, clamp_down)

Append a semi-stiff constraint with camera rotation clamping.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
obj Object Object ID
target Object | Array Object ID or [Armature object ID, Bone Name]
offset Float32Array Offset in parent local space
rotation_offset Float32Array <optional>
 Rotation offset in parent local space
clamp_left Number Clamp camera rotation left for the azimuth angle
clamp_right Number Clamp camera rotation right for the azimuth angle
clamp_up Number Clamp camera rotation up for the elevation angle
clamp_down Number Clamp camera rotation down for the elevation angle
